title: Run Local Diagnostic Script (Python Wrapper)
description: Execute the scripts/debug_connection.ts using subprocess to leverage the local node environment and Prisma configuration.

title: verify smooth scrolling context in root layout
description: Test the root layout to ensure the global styles, fonts, and smooth scrolling context are applied correctly and provide a consistent look and feel across the site.

title: validate reusable ui components rendering
description: Verify that all reusable UI components such as Buttons, Cards, Sections, MagneticButton, and GlassCard render correctly and maintain consistent styling and accessibility.

title: test tour booking page functionality
description: Perform end-to-end testing of the tour booking page to ensure all booking actions and flows work correctly, including form interactions and reservation completion.

title: check gsap and lenis animation integration
description: Validate that GSAP and Lenis animation libraries are integrated properly and enhance UI interactions with smooth and performant animations.

title: ensure tailwind css v4 configuration correctness
description: Verify that Tailwind CSS v4 is configured correctly with PostCSS and that there are no CSS warnings or errors during development and build processes.

title: confirm nextjs font and image optimization
description: Test the usage of Next.js next/font/local for fonts and next/image for images to ensure optimization and reduction of cumulative layout shifts (CLS).

title: validate client component directives
description: Check that all client components using browser APIs include the explicit "use client" directive to prevent React hydration errors.

title: verify package dependency compatibility
description: Ensure that all package dependencies for Next.js, React, GSAP, Lenis, and other libraries are compatible and stable with the experimental tech stack.

title: test homepage content and smooth scrolling
description: Verify that the homepage loads with smooth scrolling enabled and displays content sections styled consistently according to the design.

title: check site performance and client side rendering
description: Validate that the site performs smooth client-side rendering with immediate feedback on user interactions and minimal layout shifts.
